alert.note: Alert for Day; Marshall; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 04 at 12:51PM MDT until April 06 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Marshall, Roberts and Day Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
